name: Tap It Big: Casino Empire
description:
You are the owner of a small casino. Tap to grow your collection of slots machines, roulette wheels and BlackJack tables to bring in money. Invest in improvements to earn bigger profits at faster rates, then purchase new and better casinos to finally claim your place on the Las Vegas strip! Earn a Billion, Octillion, Quattuorvigintillion!

Make money. Make it big. Tap it Big!

Tap It Big : Casino Empire features:
• Easy and accessible pick up and play gameplay
• Boosts, shares and upgrades bring in more profits for your casino
• A spinning Profit Wheel to multiply your income
• New casino locations to purchase and expand your empire
• Increasing profits even while offline!

We love to hear from our players! Tweet us @PikPokGames using the hashtag #TapItBig. Share your screenshots with us on Instagram with #PikPok!

Disclaimer: Tap It Big : Casino Empire does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money. It is intended for amusement purposes only.

Tap It Big : Casino Empire is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
publishers: Prodigy Design Limited T/A Sidhe Interactive
